features: #1 PREMATURE INFANT FORMULA BRAND: And the #1 brand fed in the NICU
EXCELLENT CATCH-UP GROWTH: Supports better gains in weight, length, and head circumference for premature babies when compared to term infant formula
SUPPORTS BRAIN & EYE DEVELOPMENT: Has our unique blend of DHA, lutein, & vitamin E to support brain and eye development
HELPS SUPPORT BONE GROWTH: Our formula has calcium and phosphorus for baby’s growing bones
NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES: The first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones
body.description: Product Description Similac NeoSure* premature post-discharge baby formula promotes excellent catch-up growth1 during a premature baby’s first 12 months of life. It has enriched nutrition—with increased protein, vitamins, minerals, and increased calories for growth compared to term infant formula—as well as calcium and phosphorus for baby’s growing bones. It has DHA, lutein, and vitamin E to support baby’s brain and eye development, and it has no artificial growth hormones.‡ * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. † Total US premature infant formula, all outlets as of 12/2021 Nielsen data. ‡ No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. Reference: 1. Carver JD, et al. Pediatrics. 2001;107(4):683-689. Brand Story By Similac

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More to Consider Than Height and Weight Your baby’s doctor will track your preemie’s height, weight, and head size to be sure your baby is getting the nutrition they need to catch up on growth during their first year. These are important indicators of baby’s progress that you can see and measure. However, your preemie is catching up in ways you can’t see and measure. Catching Up on the Inside, Too Even after your baby has caught up on the outside, Similac NeoSure continues to deliver beneficial nutrients that support growth and development you can’t see—such as for internal organs, muscles, bones, and the brain. That’s why it’s important to continue to feed a nutrient-enriched formula like NeoSure until baby’s first birthday. Enriched Nutrition for a Preemie’s First Year Similac NeoSure supports better rates of growth during a premature baby’s first year compared to term infant formula.1 It has increased protein, vitamins, and minerals compared to term infant formula, and nucleotides for the developing immune system. Reference: 1. Carver JD, et al. Pediatrics. 2001;107(4):683-689.

Supports Brain & Eye Development Similac NeoSure has our exclusive blend of DHA for brain nourishment, lutein for eye health, and vitamin E for growth and development—all important nutrients naturally found in breast milk. No Palm Olein Oil Formulas with no palm olein oil have been shown to promote softer stools for babies, more like breastfed infants. And our no-palm-olein-oil blend supports excellent calcium absorption. Feeding Resources No matter how you choose to feed your baby, Similac is here to support your journey. The Similac Feeding Expert team can provide nutrition support and feeding advice when you need it. MySimilac Rewards With MySimilac Rewards, get nutrition guidance for you and baby, exclusive benefits, coupons, and much more.

Similac NeoSure* Similac Pro-Total Comfort* Similac 360 Total Care Sensitive* Similac Alimentum Enriched Nutrition** for Babies Born Prematurely ✓ Complete Nutrition for Infants ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Has DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Has 2'-FL HMO for Immune Support ✓ ✓ ✓ 5-HMO Prebiotic Blend Including 2'-FL HMO ✓ For Fussiness & Gas Due to Lactose Sensitivity ✓ ✓ Partially Hydrolyzed Whey Protein for Easy Digestion ✓ Hypoallergenic for Cow's Milk Allergy ✓ *Not for infants or children with galactosemia ✓ ✓ ✓ **Increased protein, vitamins, and minerals, compared to term formula ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the cheapest I've been able to find for this formula. It is definitely a steal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the exp date !!
reviews.reviewText: Cheaper if you buy 6 or more than other places and live the exp date I bought it in 2023 and they exp in 2025

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ronin loved this formula! We did recently switch to the powder because we were gifted a Brezza.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product. Review on shipping
reviews.reviewText: I would really appreciate the packaging and shipping team on this. It is delivered safely with out any damage to bottles. Product no doubt it is good for my baby. We are giving the same from 0 to 9 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this product, and I am extremely pleased with it. It has made my life so much easier.The price is also very reasonable for the quality and functionality you get. I feel like I got great value for my money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s more convenient to purchase these on Amazon and the price is great. I have twins so I need a great amount. Target and other stores are limited purchasing for 8 bottles max per time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This the formula we use for our preemie baby . It’s hard to fine the teddy mix in stores but can always find it here

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is not a bad review just something unfortunate
reviews.reviewText: Hi, Baby and I love this brand . We ordered four cases because of the shortage but one of the case so far the milk have gone bad in it I don’t know if it is because of where you guys stored it. However I don’t know what to do because the other three boxes I did not open yet and it looks like this is not eligible for a return so I guess I get to lose out on my money and I have to order another four cases but I don’t know if that is going to have the same issue. I never had an issue with this brand before I went to the supermarket and just picked up six individual cases so now I’m just losing money . How should I get my money back at this point because I like to order it again Plus I have no choice.
